select
distinct
from staffs left join edubackgrounds on staffs.EduBackgroundID = edubackgrounds.EduBackgroundID left join jobs on staffs.JobID = jobs.JobID left join sexs on staffs.SexID = sexs.SexID left join grades on staffs.GradeID = grades.GradeID

from staffs left join edubackgrounds on staffs.EduBackgroundID = edubackgrounds.EduBackgroundID left join jobs on staffs.JobID = jobs.JobID left join sexs on staffs.SexID = sexs.SexID left join grades on staffs.GradeID = grades.GradeID where StaffID = #{staffsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
